levels.description:
Stops attacking, gradually recovers <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP in total
While skill is active, restores the HP of surrounding allied Operators by <@ba.vup>{attack@heal_scale:0%}</> of Wanqing's ATK every second, and increases their ASPD by <@ba.vup>+{attack@attack_speed}</> if they are deployed facing the same direction as Wanqing
